channel.title: Crafting x5 x10 All
channel.description: I have been looking for a tutorial for Crafting so I can add in Craft x5, x10, and all. Because for some reason my source doesn't have it. If someone could post a link to a tutorial if there is one it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!

item.title: Crafting x5 x10 All
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“kriskuhar, post:3, topic:518712”]Can I use the same Interface Ids as the smelting one?[/quote]you can use the same code for the x5 as a base you have to use the interface id’s specific to crafting though. You can find them out there on google though I’m sure…

Read full topic

item.title: Crafting x5 x10 All
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

um what…?

craft codes goes here
c.openInterface (blah)

go to clickingbuttons…

interface id:
c.blah blah x blah

interface id:

c.blah blah x blah

etc…really if you look at smithing x5, x10 you can do the same exact thing with crafting.

Read full topic
